text: Pexember! Tu ji bona qirine helana bide bawergeran. Heke ji we (bawergeran) bist meriven hewdai hebin; Ewane li du sed (merive neyar) servahatine bikin. U heke ji we sed meriven hewdai hebin; we ewane li hezar (meriven fileyen neyar) servehatine bikin. Loma bi rasti ewan komaleki wusa nin; qe qenci u xirabiyan ji hev dernaxin
